scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "cd api && npm run dev:local" "cd web && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd api && npm run build && cd ../web && npm run build
